00045 // This class is used to route equalizer log into the omega log system.
00046 class EqualizerLogStreamBuf: public std::streambuf
00047 {
00048 protected:
00049         virtual int overflow ( int c = EOF )
00050         {
00051                 if(c == '\n')
00052                 {
00053                         omsg(myStringStream.str().c_str());
00054                         myStringStream.str(""); 
00055                 }
00056                 else
00057                 {
00058                         myStringStream << (char)c;
00059                 }
00060                 return 0;
00061         }
00062 private:
00063     std::ostringstream myStringStream;
00064 };
00065 
00067 class OMEGA_API EqualizerDisplaySystem: public DisplaySystem
00068 {
00069 public:
00070         EqualizerDisplaySystem();
00071         ~EqualizerDisplaySystem();
00072 
00073         // sets up the display system. Called before initalize.
00074         void setup(Setting& setting);
00075 
00076         void initialize(SystemManager* sys); 
00077         void run(); 
00078         void cleanup(); 
00079 
00080         String getDisplayConfig() { return myDisplayConfig; }
00081         void setDisplayConfig(const String& value) { myDisplayConfig = value; }
00082 
00083         Observer* getObserver(int observerId);
00084 
00085         // Layer and view management.
00086         void setLayer(const char* viewName, Layer::Enum layer);
00087         Layer::Enum getLayer(const char* viewName);
00088 
00089         virtual DisplaySystemType getId() { return DisplaySystem::Equalizer; }
00090 
00091 private:
00092         void initLayers();
00093         void initObservers();
00094
